quoteText: If we cancel or modify our program such that you will no longer have access to the download link or digital key(s) in your account, we will provide at least 90 daysâ€™ advance notice to you using the contact information for the related Microsoft account.
title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time
tosdr.tldr: [good] You will be given 90 days' notice before key storage functionality is removed
